about:
I am an experienced IT professional with expertise in hardware and networking, cloud computing, and DevOps. With a B.Sc. in Computer Science from Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar Marathwada University and global certifications in CCNA, CCNP, and CCNA Security, I bring a strong foundation in networking and system administration. 

 I have over three years of hands-on experience managing IT infrastructures, optimizing AWS cloud services (including EC2, VPC, IAM, and Route53), and implementing DevOps practices like CI/CD pipelines using Git and Jenkins. My skill set extends to configuring Cisco devices, managing Radware load balancers, and maintaining secure IT environments. 

 In my roles, I have streamlined IT operations, relocated data centers, and ensured 99.9% system uptime, showcasing my ability to enhance performance and reliability. Passionate about leveraging technology to drive innovation, I am committed to delivering scalable and secure solutions.
